labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Mint 17.3 XFCE using lastest Discord client.  I was told to report this in general bug channel because it happens on all clients.
data.actual_result: Red notification stays there and does not go away
data.expected_result: Checking it should get rid of the red notification
data.short_description: DM notification will not go away
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone DM you who has never DMed you before - Have them delete the DM before you can check it
